title: Passages from the English Note-books of Nathaniel Hawthorne. [Edited by S. H., i.e. Sophia Hawthorne.]
author: Hawthorne, Nathaniel
snippet: July 9th (Our wedding-day.) — We were invitedyesterday evening to Mrs. S. C. Hall's, where JennyLind was to sing; so we left Blackheath at abouteight o'clock in a brougham, and reached AshleyPlace, as the dusk was gathering, after nine. TheHalls reside in a handsome suite of apartments, arranged on the new system of flats, each story constituting a separate tenement, and the various families
